hero.text3: Digital parking disc - directly on your mobile.
hero.text4: A winning concept in a new, digitalized format
hero.about3: We are a young company dedicated to transforming the parking
hero.about4: experience for all stakeholders – drivers, parking attendants,

smart_parking_solution.title: Smart Parking Solution
smart_parking_solution.paragraph: The parking disc has long been a tool to promote circulation and activity in city centers. It's a fantastic solution that benefits residents, visitors, and local businesses alike. We want to be part of this evolution by creating a free digital parking disc.
smart_parking_solution.arrow1: We aim to support the growth and efficiency of urban areas.
smart_parking_solution.arrow2: Our digital parking disc simplifies the parking process.
smart_parking_solution.arrow3: Any parking attendant system can easily be integrated with our system.
smart_parking_solution.final_paragraph: We're excited to share more about our solution in a meeting with you.

testimonials.title: Customer testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from some of our clients
testimonials.main_text1: “Most digital parking solutions are aimed at paid parking, which doesn't really suit us. That's why we became interested in Parking Time's solution, which means being able to easily use a digital parking disc at no cost.”
testimonials.main_text2: “Nässjö municipality works with digitalization in several areas, including electronic parking. In this area we have invested in a collaboration with Parking Time, which has worked very well from several aspects”

why_parking_time.title: Why Parking Time?
why_parking_time.Comp_1_paragraph: Our digital solution attracts more visitors by eliminating physical discs and reducing fines. This simplifies parking, boosts foot traffic, economic activity and city vibrancy, while reducing stress.
why_parking_time.Comp_2_paragraph: Our app lets you effortlessly set, adjust, and monitor parking time. With a user-friendly interface, you can quickly find parking spots and manage your parking. We continuously update our service based on customer feedback to ensure a quick and hassle-free experience.
why_parking_time.Comp_3_paragraph: Our system for parking attendants integrates seamlessly with your existing setup. A unified system benefits you by streamlining operations and it also improves work processes by eliminating the need for separate systems and devices. We make this integration efficient, intuitive, and simple!
why_parking_time.Comp_4_paragraph: The digital parking disc can optimize parking resources and urban planning through valuable usage data and behavior patterns, leading to a safer society with optimal availabilty of parking spaces.

download_now.title: Download now
download_now.p: The app is free to download and use. However, your municipality must be registered as a customer with us for our app to be usable in your area. If our app is not available in your municipality, you are welcome to contact us or suggest us to your municipality!

MatildaCEO.title: Want to know more?
MatildaCEO.paragraph: Contact us to find out more about our solution and how we can implement it in your municipality.

FAQ.answer1: Parking Time is a simple and flexible app that replaces physical parking discs.
FAQ.title2: How do I use Parking Time?
FAQ.answer2: Download the app, enter the vehicle's registration number, select the parking zone and then start your parking. No sensitive banking or personal information is required.
FAQ.title4: How do I get it in my municipality?
FAQ.answer4: Contact your municipality if you want Parking Time to work in your area.
FAQ.title5: Do I need to leave my smartphone in the car's windshield like with the traditional p-disk?
FAQ.answer5: No, unlike the traditional parking disc, you start your parking in the app and then take your smartphone with you when you leave your vehicle.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.quotation: “Of all the things that you need to think about during the day, parking should be one of the least concerns. Parking should be so seamless that you hardly need to think about it at all; it should just work. We call this Smart Parking.
about_us.author: - Matilda, CEO and Founder.
about_us.card_1_p: We are striving to create simple and smooth experiences.
about_us.card_2_p: Always trying to improve and making our app a leader in its field.
about_us.card_3_p: It's crucial that our service meets users' needs and enhances their parking experience.

howitworks.p1: Open the app, register with your car's registration number.
howitworks.p2: Use the map, search function, or zone list to find your desired parking location.
howitworks.p3: Once you select your parking zone, you can review any applicable rules, start parking, and then simply close the app.

story.p1: Our vision is to make parking easier than ever and also make our solution available in areas that currently have no digital parking.
story.p2: Digital parking solutions enable cities to take advantage of new digital values - such as efficiencies, cost savings and parking information that is useful as basis for future urban planning decisions. Digital parking also helps users to park correctly and to avoid fines - beneficial for both the wallet and traffic safety!
story.p3: Parking Time Sweden was founded in 2021 in Luleå. Today, we operate throughout Sweden with the ambition to expand globally in the coming years. We hope you want to be part of our journey!

team.title: Meet our team
team.subtitle: Each member brings a unique blend of expertise, passion, and forward-thinking mindset.

privacypolicy.p1: This policy applies to all websites services and products of Parking Time Sweden AB. The personal data policy applies to Parking Time in connection with services and products related to purchases, customer service matters, other communication with Parking Time, and visits to the website. Protecting your personal data is important to us!
privacypolicy.h2-personaldata: Your personal data are significant to us
privacypolicy.p2: Parking Time collects and processes personal data about you when you visit or make a purchase on any of our websites or apps, or contacts Parking Time via email or social media. Parking Time is committed to protecting your privacy and ensures a high level of data protection. This privacy policy explains why and how we collect and use your personal information. It also describes your rights and how you can exercise them. For us, it is essential that the personal data you entrust to us as a customer and reader is handled in a careful, responsible, transparent, and lawful manner.
privacypolicy.h2-responsible: Who is responsible for the data that we collect?
privacypolicy.p3: Parking Time Sweden AB is the responsible data controller for your personal data and is responsible for ensuring that all processing is carried out in accordance with applicable legislation.
privacypolicy.p4: Personal data is any type of information that can directly or indirectly be attributed to a living individual. Examples of personal data include name, email address, phone number, and personal identification numbers. Images and video recordings are also considered personal data even if no names are mentioned. Encrypted data and various electronic identities (such as IP addresses) are also considered personal data if they can be linked to natural persons.
privacypolicy.h2-personaldatacomefrom: Where do your personal data come from?
privacypolicy.p5: The primary source of personal data about you is you, for example the information that you provide when you sign up for a subscription, contact us via email, or receive/respond to an email communication. Personal data is also created as a result of you reading information on our website, using services, and communicating with us. For example, we may save visit, traffic, and other communication data. Examples of such personal data include your IP address and your exact position when you start parking. This data can be collected via cookies and used to display content to you based on target visitor information to you. To do this, we need your consent. You give this consent by accepting cookies when you visit our website.
privacypolicy.h2-parkingtimeinformation: From where does Parking Time get information for the parking zones?
privacypolicy.p6: Parking Time Sweden AB presents parking zones in the app. Information regarding the parking zones comes from municipalities and property oweners. Parking Time is a company that does not represent any government authority.
privacypolicy.h2-personaldatacollect: Personal data that we collect about you when we require them
privacypolicy.p7: We collect personal data that you provide to us, such as your name, contact information, and payment details. We may also collect data about your usage of our services to improve our offerings.
privacypolicy.li3: User's GPS location and IP address at the time of parking.
privacypolicy.li4: Contact information (address, email, and phone number).
privacypolicy.p8: In a cookie, it is possible to track a user's browsing activity. Cookies are used to provide you as a visitor with access to various functions and to customize content in our services. We also use cookies on our website to gather statistics on how the website is used. A cookie is a text file that is saved in your device so that the website can recognize your device. This cookie does not contain any personal information. There are two types of cookies: permanent and temporary (so-called session cookies). Permanent cookies are stored in files on your device for a longer period, while session cookies are temporarily placed on your device and only used while you browse the site, they are deleted afterwards. If you want to know when your device receives a cookie, you can set your browser to notify you. This way, you have the opportunity to accept or reject cookies. Your device can also be set to reject all cookies. Please note that if you choose not to accept cookies, some features of our online services may no longer function as intended.
privacypolicy.h2-consent: Special Considerations for Consent to Direct Marketing
privacypolicy.p9: Provided that you have given us your explicit consent, we will continuously send and publish information and marketing via various digital channels based on your profile. You may opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time by clicking unsubscribe in the email or SMS communication that we send you. You can also contact Parking Time via info@parkingtime.se for assistance in blocking our communication.
privacypolicy.h2-keepinformation: How long do we keep your information?
privacypolicy.p10: Your personal data is only stored for as long as there is a need to keep it to fulfill the purposes for which the data was collected. Parking Time may retain the data longer if necessary to comply with legal requirements or to protect Parking Time's legal interests.
privacypolicy.p11: Your personal data may be shared with other companies that are Parking Time's data processors. A data processor is a company that processes information on our behalf and according to our instructions. Parking Time's data processors perform services on our behalf, such as hosting our servers or sending emails. All disclosures will be made in accordance with the law, and your personal data will not be used for purposes other than those we have informed you about. We have written agreements with all data processors through which they guarantee the security of the personal data and undertake to comply with our security requirements as well as limitations and requirements regarding the international transfer of personal data. When your personal data is shared with a company that is an independent data controller, that company's privacy policy and data processing applies. Examples of independent data controllers with whom we share your personal data include:
privacypolicy.li5: Government agencies in case of suspected crime.
privacypolicy.h2-processpersonal: Where do we process your personal data?
privacypolicy.p12: We ensure that your personal data is processed only within the EU/EEA, and all our own IT systems are located within the EU/EEA.
privacypolicy.p13: According to the EU data protection legislation, you have certain statutory rights as an individual in relation to the personal data that we process. If you encounter information about yourself or related individuals that you for any reason do not want to be published on Parking Time's website, we appreciate it if you contact us via info@parkingtime.se. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Swedish Data Protection Authority (Integritetsskyddsmyndigheten), if you believe that our processing of your personal data does not comply with the requirements of EU data protection legislation.
privacypolicy.li6: Access to your personal data: You have the right to access your personal data and how it is processed.
privacypolicy.li7: Correction, deletion, or restriction: You have the right to correct data that you believe is inaccurate. In some cases, you also have the right to have your personal data deleted. However, this does not apply if your personal data still needs to be retained, for example, if the law requires us to store the data or if the data is needed to fulfill an agreement we have with you. You also have the right to request that the processing of personal data be restricted for a shorter period while we investigate any inaccuracies.
privacypolicy.li8: Withdrawal of consent: If you have given consent to certain processing, you always have the right to withdraw your consent.
privacypolicy.li9: Objection regarding balancing of interests: When processing is based on a so-called balancing of interests, you have the right to object to the processing at any time.
privacypolicy.li10: Objection to direct marketing: You have the right to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you for direct marketing purposes. In that case, the personal data should no longer be processed for such purposes.
privacypolicy.li11: Data portability: You have the right to data portability, which means that under certain circumstances, you have the right to receive the personal data about you that you have provided to us, in order to transfer the data to another data controller
privacypolicy.p14: If you wish to exercise any of your statutory rights, we ask you to send a written and personally signed request to the address provided below. You can also always contact Parking Time via our website if you have any questions regarding the processing of your personal data. We will respond in writing to your registered address. You can also contact Parking Time via info@parkingtime.se for any comments or complaints about how we handle your personal data.
privacypolicy.h2-purposelegal: Purpose and legal grounds for processing your personal data
privacypolicy.p15: The processing of your personal data serves specific purposes, grounded in the legal grounds outlined below. Additionally, we elucidate how your personal data is processed for marketing purposes.
privacypolicy.li12: Fulfillment of Orders for Services and Subscriptions
privacypolicy.li12-1: Legal Basis: Performance of a contract of which you are a party.
privacypolicy.li13-1: Upon your consent, we send newsletters.
privacypolicy.li13-3: Consent provided by you for this type of processing
privacypolicy.li14-1: Handling queries directed to Parking Time via info@parkingtime.se or to other responsible persons at Parking Time, received through email, telephone, or digital channels, including all social platforms
privacypolicy.li15-1: Handling complaints received through email, telephone, or other digital channels, including social media.
privacypolicy.li15-3: Performance of a contract of which you are a party.
privacypolicy.li16-1: Utilization of your transactions for our accounting and reporting purposes.
privacypolicy.li16-2: Legal Basis: Fulfillment of legal obligations
privacypolicy.p17: For each purpose, a distinct legal basis is identified, ensuring compliance with relevant legal requirements. These purposes are clearly delineated to facilitate transparency and accountability in the processing of personal data by Parking Time Sweden AB.

termsOfService.h1: Parking Time - General Terms and Conditions
termsOfService.p1-1: These terms govern the use of all services provided by Parking Time Sweden AB (Parking Time), 559315-7547, to users (individuals over 18 years old) and parking operators (legal entities) in Sweden. For services that have specific terms, the specific terms of the service shall take precedence over these general terms.
termsOfService.p1-2: Parking Time is a digital parking disc that helps users easily park in places that require a parking disc. It is offered to users via an app for mobile phones with Android and iOS operating systems, and to our customers via a BackOffice web for managing parkings and parking zones.
termsOfService.p1-3: Parking Time does not offer parking spaces on its own, but all parking takes place under the conditions (in addition to Parking Time's terms) that the respective parking operator specifies on signs at the parking lot.
termsOfService.p2-1: These terms are accepted by users when using the app, and by parking operators when using the BackOffice web. The user thereby consents to the processing of personal data as described below. These terms apply both when Parking Time is the data controller and the data processor.
termsOfService.p3-1: Parking Time collects and processes personal data to provide, manage, and charge for its services.
termsOfService.p3-2: For using the app, only the vehicle registration number (license plate number) is required. The user's position is collected (if the user explicitly allows it) and saved during the parking and for a short time thereafter, to offer the user good functions during parking and a receipt/proof of parking in case of a dispute over parking fines.
termsOfService.p3-3: For registering a user account for parking, monitoring, and BackOffice, only an email address is required. Other personal data can be registered (name, phone number, personal identification number) for easier contact with the user and for verifying the person's identity.
termsOfService.p3-4: Additional personal data can be retrieved from the population register and the road traffic register, to the extent necessary to offer secure and easy-to-use services.
termsOfService.p3-5: Parking Time shares personal data with parking operators for the land where the user parks, for follow-up and parking control, and also via third parties. The personal data provided by the user to Parking Time is never disclosed to third parties for marketing. However, anonymized statistical information can be disclosed to third parties by Parking Time.
termsOfService.p4-1: Parking Time's app offers users functions to find parking spaces, and to start, manage, and end parking. During ongoing parking, the user sees the end time and receives reminders in the app before the parking time expires.
termsOfService.p4-2: Parking Time has the right to block the use of the app for a specific registration number, email address, phone number, or personal identification number in case of misuse.
termsOfService.p5-1: Use of Parking Time's app is free for users, but with agreed fees from parking operators.
termsOfService.p6-1: Parking Time handles users' and parking operators' data on secure servers and with secure encrypted communication with the app.
termsOfService.p6-2: Parking Time stores and manages personal data and other parking information only as long as necessary to provide the services to users and to comply with laws and agreements. All personal data is deleted no later than 15 months after they were last needed for these reasons. User accounts therefore become unusable no later than 15 months after last use.
termsOfService.p7-1: Users use Parking Time's app at their own risk. Parking Time is not responsible for any losses or damages due to the use, unless otherwise provided by Swedish law. Users must follow the applicable road markings and other signage regarding the conditions for parking.
termsOfService.p7-2: Parking Time's maps of parking zones are intended to help find parking opportunities and do not necessarily indicate the exact boundaries of the parking areas; the user must always check the signage on site.
termsOfService.p7-3: Parking Time's servers have very high availability, but temporary interruptions may occur. When this happens, the user is responsible for finding another way to register the parking.
termsOfService.p8-1: Parking Time follows the provisions of the Data Protection Act and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) regarding users' rights. Users can exercise their rights by contacting Parking Time's support, see contact details at the end of these terms. Users have the right to
termsOfService.li8-1: receive information about what personal data Parking Time has stored about them, after confirmation that the request is made from the identity (email address, phone number, or personal identification number) that registered the personal data. Requests with confirmed personal identification number can concern personal data without time limitation. Requests from email addresses can only concern personal data that has been registered in the last 6 months, as email addresses can be transferred to another person. Requests from phone numbers can only concern personal data that has been registered in the last 3 months, as phone numbers can be transferred to another person.
termsOfService.li8-2: have incorrect personal data corrected, but not incorrectly provided registration numbers for vehicles, or other information about completed parkings.
termsOfService.li8-3: have all personal data deleted that does not need to be retained by Parking Time to comply with laws and agreements.
termsOfService.li8-4: opt out of all future marketing from Parking Time.
termsOfService.li8-5: have personal data exported to standard file format for use with another company. Parking Time stores very few such personal data, and they can therefore easily be retrieved with a screenshot from the app.
termsOfService.p8-2: The following rights are fulfilled by the description in these terms:
termsOfService.li8-6: The right to know what personal data is collected, the purpose of the processing of personal data, and which other parties may receive the personal data.
termsOfService.p8-3: After a parking has started, it cannot be canceled, but it can usually be ended early. In some parking zones, however, there is a one-minute right of withdrawal.
termsOfService.li9-1: Protect the app (mobile phone) from unauthorized use
termsOfService.li9-2: Protect passwords from unauthorized access and immediately notify Parking Time if the password is suspected to have been disclosed
termsOfService.li9-3: Ensure that the mobile phone has a working Internet connection
termsOfService.li9-4: Register correct personal data, and without undue delay update this information in case of changes
termsOfService.li9-5: Enter the correct parking zone and registration number (license plate number) when parking
termsOfService.li9-6: Be aware that a parking has started or ended only when a confirmation of it has been received in the app
termsOfService.li9-7: Follow applicable regulations for parking spaces. In many parking zones, a grace period is applied that prevents a new parking from starting within 30 minutes after the maximum parking time has been reached.
termsOfService.li9-8: Use another way to register the parking if Parking Time's app temporarily does not work, regardless of the reason.
termsOfService.li9-9: Contest fines by contacting the parking surveillance whose contact details are always on the ticket. Parking Time can only assist with proof that the parking has been registered between start time and end time, for a specific registration number.
termsOfService.li9-10: Not gain undue advantages by misusing Parking Time's app, or by technical measures trying to circumvent Parking Time's protection for data and parking registrations.
termsOfService.p10-1: Parking Time has the right to update these terms at any time. Such changes shall be announced via a news item on www.parkingtime.se and the latest version of these terms shall always be published on that website.
termsOfService.p10-2: Users who do not want to be bound by the changed terms must notify Parking Time within a reasonable time, and at the same time request that Parking Time deletes all personal data according to section 7 of these terms.
termsOfService.p11-1: Parking Time has the right to transfer all rights and obligations under these terms to a third party in their entirety. This may occur, for example, in the event of the acquisition of Parking Time. Such transfer shall be notified without undue delay via a change to these terms according to section 9.
termsOfService.p11-2: Parking Time has the right to transfer parts of its obligations under these terms to a third party, to streamline its processes for offering apps and services to users or parking operators. Such transfer shall be notified without undue delay via a news item on www.parkingtime.se and the latest version of these terms shall always be published on that website.
termsOfService.p12-1: Parking Time owns all intellectual property rights related to its services and apps. Users are not permitted to use functions or source code for Parking Time's websites or apps beyond what is offered via their user interfaces.
termsOfService.p13-1: Parking Time follows all recommendations of the Swedish National Board for Consumer Disputes, www.arn.se.
termsOfService.p13-2: All disputes between Parking Time and its users shall be resolved in accordance with Swedish law. Disputes that cannot be resolved through dialogue between the parties shall be decided by the Stockholm District Court, unless otherwise provided by Swedish law.
termsOfService.p13-3: This section 12 shall apply even after users have ceased all use of Parking Time's services and apps.
termsOfService.p14-1: Parking Time Sweden AB, Sankt Eriksgatan 121, 113 43 STOCKHOLM
